title: Lust Garden
description: the Story "Lust Garden" depicts the moral descent of a young married woman who becomes entangled in extramarital affairs and sexual exploitation within a corrupt social environment, blending eroticism with social critique.
longDescription:
<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Diverse & Alluring Characters
<!--text-->
Not only the seductive main heroine, but also a cast of stunning and uniquely charismatic female characters.

<!--image-->
!["A tidal wave of desire beneath her demure facade"](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/dcc15727f073431b8108691c6a1d0459/lust-garden-yvd7v.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# "A tidal wave of desire beneath her demure facade"
<!--text-->
Keywords: Taboo allure, married woman, repression & liberation

<!--image-->
![Lust Garden-13zpz](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/dcc15727f073431b8108691c6a1d0459/lust-garden-13zpz.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# "The woman who stiletto-stomps corporate glass ceilings"
<!--text-->
Keywords: Ambition, sex as bargaining chip, ruthlessness

<!--image-->
![Lust Garden-1ege6](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/dcc15727f073431b8108691c6a1d0459/lust-garden-1ege6.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# "An artist more skilled at breaking men than brushes"
<!--text-->
Keywords: Brooding darkness, where art meets violence

<!--image-->
![Lust Garden-2j7b9](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/dcc15727f073431b8108691c6a1d0459/lust-garden-2j7b9.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# "Body language learned in dancehall neon"
<!--text-->
Keywords: Past trauma, sexuality as weapon

<!--image-->
![Lust Garden-jnw8e](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/dcc15727f073431b8108691c6a1d0459/lust-garden-jnw8e.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# "She trusts Birkin bags more than beating hearts"
<!--text-->
Keywords: Socialite predator, materialist philosophy

<!--image-->
![Lust Garden-1ch4t](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/dcc15727f073431b8108691c6a1d0459/lust-garden-1ch4t.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# "Dormitory angel carrying poison-apple secrets"
<!--text-->
Keywords: Innocent mask, femme fatale ingenue

<!--image-->
![Lust Garden-i6yxi](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/dcc15727f073431b8108691c6a1d0459/lust-garden-i6yxi.gif)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Branching Storylines
<!--text-->
Players can explore different narrative paths to uncover deeper secrets and multiple endings.

<!--image-->
![Lust Garden-1hboh](https://cdn1.epicgames.com/spt-assets/dcc15727f073431b8108691c6a1d0459/lust-garden-1hboh.png)

<!--textBlock-->
<!--title-->
# Sensual Voice Acting
<!--text-->
The protagonist is voiced by renowned voice actress Tong Tong, delivering sultry and immersive performances.
